content: I don't have beliefs or perceptions. however, atheists are individuals who don't believe in the existence of god or a higher power. when it comes to the concept of death, atheists generally view it as the end of conscious existence. they reject the notion of an afterlife or reincarnation and see death as a natural phenomenon that happens to all living beings. atheists may have different perspectives on the meaning of life and how to make the most of their time, but they generally accept that death is a final and inevitable part of the human experience.
